workercard.cardlines:
Kobold Miner
Work Rating: 1
Security Rating: 2
Darkvision: +/- 1
Mining bonus +2
Upkeep: 1 nutrition
(Omnivore)
workercard.help:
Kobolds are small, numerous, and reliable workers, well suited to the underground.
Darkvision: Get a bonus to work and security in dark times/places, and a penalty in bright times/places.
Omnivore: kobolds can eat anything.
